short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Code Editor for LUA on ESP8266

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome based Code Editor for LUA (nodemcu)
Supported functions are:
- source Editor for LUA
- blockly Editor
- Javascript --> LUA converter
- project directory on local drive
- upload source code to ESP8266 based board
- handling of files on ESP8266 board
- testing screen to display values from ESP8266 board
